channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: A HMO at 36 Holtwhites Hill does not have sufficient bins and because they are overflowing the bins do not get emptied. Leading this week for the green bin being emptied of bags and left on the pavement., 21st September
item.description:
Rubbish build up over the last month leading to foxes and rats eating out daily and spreading the rubbish/food up and down Holtwhites Hill. There are both infant, junior and secondary school students walking pass daily and is a hazard both on health grounds and accident hazard

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 35, Holtwhite's Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 4 dead saplings by their tree stakes in the council-owned green space (former Cyphers Cricket Ground) in Kings Hall Rd, by the jct with Bailes Place., 21st September
item.description:
4 dead saplings by their tree stakes in the council-owned green space (former Cyphers Cricket Ground) in Kings Hall Rd, by the jct with Bailes Place. Reported here under shrub beds as there is no menu selection for Park trees. Please also provide some name signs at either end of this open space to give it a name and identify it's ownership by LBB.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kings Hall Road, New Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: House electricity wire through top of the tree, 21st September
item.description:
Danger to electricity wire to the house from branches of the tree. Please can consider the top of the tree for pruning below the wire. There is also uplift of the kerb from the roots of the tree. Can you consider these issues and check safety for us?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 47, Lime Grove, Blackfen, Sidcup, London

item.title: Buly goods collection NOT collected, 21st September
item.description:
I booked and paid for a bulky goods collection from my address with the attached photo showing the broken down bed which was left outside my house, however the collection removed the WRONG things (that were not in the photo!) and left the actual waste I wanted to be collected. The reference number is 8152265. Please can this be rectified ASAP.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kingswood Road, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hedge overhanging footpath, 21st September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 75, Wellington Road, Poverest, Orpington, London
